Enjoy_the_diversity_of_our_collections!: Enjoy the diversity of our collections!
Enjoy_the_diversity_of_our_audio_annotat: Enjoy the diversity of our audio annotation!
DESCRIPTION_SYLARD: SYLARD is a developing platform for the presentation and exchange of audio transcripts in indigenous languages ​​of Mesoamerica.
DESCRIPTION_SYLARD_1: Each audio transcript allows you to view and synchronize the transcripts and translations with an audio hosted on another portal.
DESCRIPTION_SYLARD_2: In this phase, we are nurturing the platform with conversations regarding ecological knowledge, in particular, the nomenclature, classification, symbolism, and economic use of flora and fauna in indigenous communities in Mexico.
SYLARD_CONTENT: We put our App at your disposal so that you can use them in another portal. Don't forget to give us credit and it's Creative Commons.
We_believe: We believe in access to knowledge and in the proper use of it.
EDIT_FIELDS: Edit the fields and hit the save button
SEND_EMAIL: We have sent an email to:
ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT: click on the link to activate your account.
IMPORTANT_PROCESS: *It is important to complete the process to be able to view the content, the email must be confirmed.
SEND_COLLABORATOR: We have sent your request to access as a collaborator. You will receive an email shortly if your request has been authorized.
PROCESS_CONCLUDE: As the process concludes, enjoy SYLARD content.
SPEED_UP_CONTENT: We did most of the heavy lifting for you to provide a default stylings that incorporate our custom components. Additionally, we refined animations and transitions to provide a smoother experience for developers.
USER_EXP_CONTENT: By utilizing elements and principles of Material Design, we were able to create a framework that incorporates components and animations that provide more feedback to users.
EASY_WORK_CONTENT: We have provided detailed documentation as well as specific code examples to help new users get started. We are also always open to feedback and can answer any questions a user may have about Materialize.
RESET_PASSWORD_MESSAGE: Enter your email account to send you a provisional password
CONTENT_ONE: SYLARD converts ELAN files to HTML and offers line-by-line playback of audio accompanied by transcriptions, translations,  or other representations.
CONTENT_TWO:
Please join as a User for full access to all SYLARD materials, or as a Contributor to put your own recorded, transcribed, and translated materials online.
All material is by default licensed as CC-BY-NC-SA
INFORMATION: *We will handle your information in accordance with federal law on the protection of personal data.
COLABORATOR: If you decide to be a collaborator
